abstract: Airstrike, presumably by Russian or Syrian government forces, kills over 30 people at tent camp for displaced Syrians in Idlib Province; assault come shortly after insurgents defied new cease-fire by attacking government forces in neighboring Aleppo Province.

headline.print_headline: Warplanes Hit Camp in Syria for Refugees, Killing Over 30
headline.main: Airstrikes in Syria Kill More Than 30 in Refugee Camp

snippet: The attack came just hours into what was supposed be to a new, 48-hour truce in the area.
lead_paragraph: The attack came just hours into what was supposed be to a new, 48-hour truce in the area.
